text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: In Western gaming, the promise of sexual content in games is commonly used as a marketing tool but many highly-sexualised games do not feature any explicitly adult content. Though some games do use sex acts or nudity as a narrative device, in-game reward, or a gameplay element, purely pornographic games are uncommon.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: Sexual content has been found in video games since the early days of the industry and games featuring sexual content can be found on most platforms.
